title: Blu's Boys
description: When one man just isnâ€™t enough... Blu Millar lost her parents a year ago, causing her to take a job with CEO of Pascal Enterprises, Paxton Pascal. She spent every Monday getting rid of his random hook-ups. She continued to push her feelings and jealousy aside each time the new flavor of the week called looking for more from her boss. Paxton, his business associate and best friend, Everest, are members of a local sex club. Everest likes to play and Paxton likes to watch. Neither of them are interested in a relationship with just one woman, much less the same woman. What will happen when Everest meets Blu and invites her to play with them? Will she say yes? Will she fall in love? Will he?
author: Aimee Stone
